QuestData.Title: Rigged to Blow
QuestData.Description: This tower was out of cannon range, so I thought we'd blow it up the old-fashioned way - in person. We set all the main charges but the guards fought us back before we could arm the detonators.$B$B$n! Get up there and arm the three detonators we placed around the base of the tower. Those things are wired into a pack of thermals I set up along the spine... It'll be some show!
QuestData.LogDescription: Arm the three Explosive Charges located around the base of the southern-most tower at Talrendis Point.
QuestData.CompletionText: Did you get 'em? Did you get all three?
QuestData.RewardText: Sweet. Let's torch this banana stand!
